Criptext
Welcome to Criptext This is your safe zone. Everything you say here is private and secure so you can have peace of mind in every word.
Welcome to Criptext 2 This is your safe zone 2

Check your inbox for an email by Criptext and click the link within to verify your new Recovery Email. Confirmation Link Sent Enter new recovery email
Enter your new recovery email. New Note: Changing your recovery email will disable two-factor authentication. Change Email Recovery email changed successfully Recovery email already is %1$s
Got it! Recovery Email Not Set 2FA Enabled! Next time you sign into your account on another device you\'ll have to enter your password and then validate the sign in from an existing device. To enable Two-Factor Authentication you must set and verify a recovery email on your account Please go to Settings > Recovery Email to complete this step.
An email was sent to %1$s with the instructions to reset your password Error contacting the server, try again later A recovery email address has not been set up or confirmed for this account, without it you cannot reset the password
Current New
Confirm your new password.\nIf you cancel, the device will logout and all local data will be erased. Password has been updated for this device. Your password has changed
Alert!: Login out will delete all emails from this device. Your emails will remain intact in your other devices, if any. Do you want to logout? Login out…
Removing this device will cause it to sign out from your account remotely. Removing device…
Passphrase must be at least 3 characters. Passphrases do not match. Non-Criptext Recipient Send Encrypted Set a passphrase and share it with non-Criptext recipients so they can read your email. Passphrase Passphrase Repeat Note: non-Criptext email addresses will receive a normal, un-encrypted email. Encrypted emails to non-Criptext recipients will expire in 10 days
Easily access your contacts\' emails Acces to your external storage To display inline images, they must be downloaded to your device. Do you wish to grant Criptext read access to your external storage? To open e-mail attachments, they must be downloaded to your device. Do you wish to grant Criptext read access to your external storage? To access files from your gallery, Criptext needs extra permissions. Do you wish to grant Criptext read access to your external storage? To access documents in your device, Criptext needs extra permissions. Do you wish to grant Criptext read access to your external storage? To access photos taken with your camera, Criptext needs extra permissions. Do you wish to grant Criptext read access to your external storage?
I\'m using Criptext for Gmail, it allows me to have control over my emails. Install it now and get 30 DAYS FREE! Criptext - Invitation
Encrypted emails can\'t be read by mail servers, so to avoid your emails from being sent to spam, each email is sent with a readable header. Customize it to your liking, however it can\'t be empty. An email signature is text, like your contact information or a favorite quote, that\'s automatically added at the end of Criptext Secure Email messages as a footer
Days Hours Minutes Days Hrs. Mins. Timer begins once the email is: Opened Sent Unsent Encrypt this email
Password must be at least 8 characters. Passwords do not match. This username is not available. Username does not exist Invalid username. Username must be at least 3 characters. Invalid email address. Name is too long. Name cannot be empty.
Sign In Two-Factor Authentication Check and approve on your existing Criptext device to continue. Didn’t get the prompt? Warning: Multiple rejections could lead your device to be blacklisted from Criptext. Resend it Sign in with password? Failed Sign In Rejected Device not approved. Creating Keys Too many login attempts, try again later. Too many devices already logged in. No devices available to authenticate this device.
Welcome! Your secure email experience starts now. Be ready for privacy without compromise. Strong Privacy Criptext doesn\'t collect email data. Your emails are only stored on your device. The power is yours You create information, we believe you have a right to own it.

Es un hecho establecido hace demasiado tiempo que un lector se distraerá con el contenido del texto de un sitio mientras que mira su diseño. El punto de usar Lorem Ipsum es que tiene una distribución más o menos normal de las letras.
